simulation module¶

simulation.step(road: road.Road, time_increment: float) → None¶

Plays one step of the simulation with the given road and time increment.

Parameters

  • road – Road object where the vehicles are stored

  • time_increment – Time increment (dt) for the simulation. For the current model, anything below 0.5s leads to a static solution (no traffic jam)

Returns

Nothing

Author

Clément Vellu

Traffic simulator
